Package: src.main.groovy.com.silly_diff.Infostructure

[Groovy] Class AbstractDiffHelper

    • src.main.groovy.com.silly_diff.Infostructure.AbstractDiffHelper

    • Parent class for Comparison implementations.
      Mostly is used as Interface (I'm too lazy for writing separate interface) and as another Util class with shared functions

        • void calcDiff()

          Most important function of this class that must provide object comparison

        • static java.lang.String getOutputElementAsString(java.lang.Object element)

          Simple alias for groovy.json.JsonOutput#prettyPrint(String jsonPayload) or
          groovy.xml.XmlUtil#serialize(groovy.util.slurpersupport.GPathResult node) function.
          Depending on type of element corresponding function will be executed

          Returns:
          java.lang.String pretty print representation of provided Object
          Parameters:
          element - groovy.util.slurpersupport.NodeChild or java.util.Map Objects that needs to be pretty printed

        • static java.lang.String getOutputListAsString(java.util.List outputList)

          Simple alias for groovy.json.JsonOutput#prettyPrint(String jsonPayload) or
          groovy.xml.XmlUtil#serialize(groovy.util.slurpersupport.GPathResult node) function.
          Refer to AbstractDiffHelper.getOutputElementAsString function for more information

          Returns:
          java.lang.String pretty print representation of provided Objects
          Parameters:
          outputList - java.util.List of groovy.util.slurpersupport.NodeChild or java.util.Map Objects that needs to be pretty printed

        • java.lang.Boolean isSimilar()

          Simple check if comparison has been completed successfully and getting simple result

          throws:
          java.lang.Exception if this function has been called before AbstractDiffHelper.calcDiff
          Returns:
          java.lang.Boolean true if no differences has been found.

        • void setupFromConfig(java.util.Map params)

          Setup all input parameters from java.util.Map config file
